org.aavso.tools.vstar.input.database
Class AAVSODatabaseConnector

java.lang.Object
  org.aavso.tools.vstar.input.database.AAVSODatabaseConnector

public class AAVSODatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles the details of connecting to the MySQL AAVSO observation database, a data accessor. This is a Singleton. Portions of code were adapted (with permission) from the AAVSO Zapper code base.

                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
Return a prepared statement for for observation retrieval with a JD range. This is a once-only-created prepared statement with parameters set.

Parameters:
connection - A JDBC connection.

setObservationWithJDRangeQueryParams

                                                 java.lang.String auid,
                                                 double minJD,
                                                 double maxJD)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
Set prepared statement parameters for observation retrieval with AUID and date range.

Parameters:
obsWithJDRangeStmt - The prepared statement on which to set parameters.
auid - The star's AUID.
minJD - The minimum Julian Day.
maxJD - The maximum Julian Day.

java.sql.SQLException
